ThingDef.label: empty growth cell
ThingDef.description: This animal growth cell is empty. Use the Gene Pod and different genetic material vials to fill it.

ThingDef.label: bear / boomalope growth cell
ThingDef.description: This growth cell has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo may develop into a Boomalope / Bear or Bear / Boomalope hybrid

ThingDef.label: bear / bird growth cell
ThingDef.description: This growth cell has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo may develop into a Bird / Bear or Bear / Bird hybrid
